attributes.action: Give the population a chance to vote for the next England manager
attributes.additional_details:
When everyone wanted Harry Redknapp we got Roy Hodgson.
Don't let it be Gareth Southgate this time around...
attributes.background:
Give the English people a voice and run a poll on who the next boss should be. 
It's our national team and we have the right to get behind a man of our choice, not have to moan about a man chosen by the football elite.
The FA should agree to try and recruit the people's choice.
